quote-source: Chris Sims, Ask Chris #38: Is There a Santa Claus? And Other Christmas Questions, Comics Alliance, December 24, 2014.
quote-text: To start with, Batman is quite possibly the hardest super-hero in comics to buy a present for. Sure, Superman can crush coal into diamonds, but heâs also the kind of guy who would genuinely appreciate a sweater. But Batman? Not only is he phenomenally wealthy, but heâs also a guy who believes that the victory is in the preparation, so he already has everything he could possibly need. I mean, this is a dude who already has a Dalek in his basement just in case he needs one.
